name: Pebble Garden
description:
Short 2D horror game made for Roccus Gamus Jamus. Made in around 2 days. All assets, images and audio are made by me within the jam time (with the exception of one of the assets, which was just a reskin).

Jam theme: Rocks and "hidden in plain sight".

Highly highly highly recommend you use headphones for the best experience.

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Interact - E
  • Space - Continue/exit dialogue

Note: Interact with pebbles to pick them up.

Tip: Be sure to interact with everything!

Tip 2: Lost? Remember the theme!
